@BBCNews That is an illegal protest under Regulation 7 of the Public Health (Coronavirus, Restrictions) (England) Regulations 2020 prohibits ALL public protests during the coronavirus emergency. 

Apparently though BBC don't care about lockdown rules being broken anymore?
